discardCardsWithMatchingIcons: Discard cards with at least 1 {'{'}{skillIcon}{'}'} icon | Discard cards with at least {count} {'{'}{skillIcon}{'}'} icons
discardTopOfYourDeck: Discard the top card of your deck | Discard the top {count} cards of your deck
doNotSpendClues: Do not spend a clue | Do not spend {count} clues
drawTopCardOfEncounterDeck: Draw the top card of the encounter deck | Draw the top {count} cards of the encounter deck
placeAgendaDoomCanAdvance: Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance. | Place {count} doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.
placeCluesOnYourLocation: Place 1 of your clues on your location | Place {count} of your clues on your location
